00060   const char *usage =
00061     "Usage: serverup [options] <server-name>\n\n"
00062     "Description:\n"
00063     "  This program checks to see if the server, specified by <server-name>\n"
00064     "  is up. return 0 if true, 1 otherwise. <server-name> may be one of the\n"
00065     "  following values: dfsbroker, hyperspace, master rangeserver\n\n"
00066     "Options";
00067 
00068   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00069     static void init_options() {
00070       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00071           ("wait", i32()->default_value(2000), "Check wait time in ms");
00072       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("server-name", str(), "");
00073       cmdline_positional_desc().add("server-name", -1);
00074     }
00075     static void init() {
00076       // we want to override the default behavior that verbose
00077       // turns on debugging by clearing the defaulted flag
00078       if (defaulted("logging-level"))
00079         properties->set("logging-level", String("fatal"));
00080     }
00081   };
00082 
00083 #ifdef HT_WITH_THRIFT
00084   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00085           MasterClientPolicy, RangeServerClientPolicy, ThriftClientPolicy,
00086           DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00087 #else
00088   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00089           MasterClientPolicy, RangeServerClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy>
00090           Policies;
00091 #endif

00093   void
00094   wait_for_connection(const char *server, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00095                       InetAddr &addr, int timeout_ms, int wait_ms) {
00096     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking "<< server <<" at "<< addr << HT_END;
00097 
00098     conn_mgr->add(addr, timeout_ms, server);
00099 
00100     if (!conn_mgr->wait_for_connection(addr, wait_ms))
00101       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to %s", server);
00102   }
00103 
00104   void check_dfsbroker(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00105     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking dfsbroker at "<< get_str("dfs-host")
00106                  <<':'<< get_i16("dfs-port") << HT_END;
00107     DfsBroker::Client *dfs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00108 
00109     if (!dfs->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00110       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to dfsbroker");
00111 
00112     HT_TRY("getting dfsbroker status", dfs->status());
00113   }
00114 
00115   Hyperspace::Session *hyperspace;
00116 
00117   void check_hyperspace(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00118     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking hyperspace at "<< get_str("hs-host")
00119                  <<':'<< get_i16("hs-port") << HT_END;
00120     Timer timer(max_wait_ms, true);
00121     int error;
00122     hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), properties, 0);
00123 
00124     if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(max_wait_ms))
00125       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to hyperspace");
00126 
00127     if ((error = hyperspace->status(&timer)) != Error::OK)
00128       HT_THROW(error, "getting hyperspace status");
00129   }
00130 
00131   void check_master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00132     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking master via hyperspace"<< HT_END;
00133     Timer timer(wait_ms, true);
00134 
00135     if (!hyperspace) {
00136       hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), properties, 0);
00137 
00138       if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00139         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to hyperspace");
00140     }
00141     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00142     Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace_ptr = hyperspace;
00143     MasterClient *master = new MasterClient(conn_mgr, hyperspace_ptr,
00144                                             wait_ms, app_queue);
00145     master->set_verbose_flag(get_bool("verbose"));
00146 
00147     master->initiate_connection(0);
00148 
00149     if (!master->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00150       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to master");
00151 
00152     master->status(&timer);
00153   }
00154 
00155   void check_rangeserver(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00156     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00157 
00158     wait_for_connection("range server", conn_mgr, addr, wait_ms, wait_ms);
00159 
00160     RangeServerClient *range_server =
00161       new RangeServerClient(conn_mgr->get_comm(), wait_ms);
00162     range_server->set_timeout(wait_ms);
00163     range_server->status(addr);
00164   }
00165 
00166   void check_thriftbroker(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, int wait_ms) {
00167 #ifdef HT_WITH_THRIFT
00168     int32_t id = -1;
00169     int timeout = get_i32("thrift-timeout");
00170     InetAddr addr(get_str("thrift-host"), get_i16("thrift-port"));
00171 
00172     wait_for_connection("thrift broker", conn_mgr, addr, timeout, wait_ms);
00173 
00174     try {
00175       Thrift::Client client(get_str("thrift-host"), get_i16("thrift-port"));
00176       id = client.get_table_id("METADATA");
00177     }
00178     catch (ThriftGen::ClientException &e) {
00179       HT_THROW(e.code, e.message);
00180     }
00181     catch (std::exception &e) {
00182       HT_THROW(Error::EXTERNAL, e.what());
00183     }
00184     HT_EXPECT(id == 0, Error::INVALID_METADATA);
00185 #else
00186     HT_THROW(Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION, "Thrift support not installed");
00187 #endif
00188   }
00189 
00190 } // local namespace
00191 
00192 #define CHECK_SERVER(_server_) do { \
00193   try { check_##_server_(conn_mgr, wait_ms); } catch (Exception &e) { \
00194     if (verbose) { \
00195       HT_DEBUG_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00196       cout << #_server_ <<" - down" << endl; \
00197     } \
00198     ++down; \
00199     break; \
00200   } \
00201   if (verbose) cout << #_server_ <<" - up" << endl; \
00202 } while (0)
00203 
00204 
00205 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00206   int down = 0;
00207 
00208   try {
00209     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00210 
00211     bool silent = get_bool("silent");
00212     uint32_t wait_ms = get_i32("wait");
00213     String server_name = get("server-name", String());
00214     bool verbose = get_bool("verbose");
00215 
00216     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00217     conn_mgr->set_quiet_mode(silent);
00218 
00219     if (server_name == "dfsbroker") {
00220       CHECK_SERVER(dfsbroker);
00221     }
00222     else if (server_name == "hyperspace") {
00223       CHECK_SERVER(hyperspace);
00224     }
00225     else if (server_name == "master") {
00226       CHECK_SERVER(master);
00227     }
00228     else if (server_name == "rangeserver") {
00229       CHECK_SERVER(rangeserver);
00230     }
00231     else if (server_name == "thriftbroker") {
00232       CHECK_SERVER(thriftbroker);
00233     }
00234     else {
00235       CHECK_SERVER(dfsbroker);
00236       CHECK_SERVER(hyperspace);
00237       CHECK_SERVER(master);
00238       CHECK_SERVER(rangeserver);
00239 #ifdef HT_WITH_THRIFT
00240       CHECK_SERVER(thriftbroker);
00241 #endif
00242     }
00243 
00244     if (!silent)
00245       cout << (down ? "false" : "true") << endl;
00246   }
00247   catch (Exception &e) {
00248     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00249     _exit(1);    // don't bother with global/static objects
00250   }
00251   _exit(down);   // ditto
00252 }
